Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 52nd overall pick, by Montreal in 2001...
Traded from Montreal to St. Louis on 7/31/2004 (Going to STL: P C. Zambrano, SS M. Tejada, CF D. Erstad, 1B C. Kotchman, 1B R. Cueto. Going to MON: CF C. Patterson, P J. Hamilton)...
Injured on 4/22/2006 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from St. Louis to Detroit on 7/31/2006 (Going to STL: 3B J. Crede, P T. Cahill. Going to DET: P M. Morris, CF D. Erstad, 1B C. Kotchman)...
Had first career hit on 7/31/2006, off Erik Bedard (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/10/2006, off Michael Bacsik (TB)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/2009, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Injured on 8/18/2010 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/6/2011, hitting .526 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Injured on 5/26/2013 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 3/1/2016 to a minor league contract.
Released by San Diego on 5/16/2017...
Retired in 2018.
Drafted in 8th round, 199th overall pick, by Montreal in 2018...
Injured on 4/8/2019 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drafted in 6th round, 105th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1977...
Had first career hit (double) on 8/11/1978, off Jake Jaeckel (NYY)...
Released by Cleveland on 6/16/1981...
